items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT!
items.body: Absolutely love this sweater by far my favorite piece of clothing I have! Read more
items.author: #LiggieMama

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful material
items.body: I purchased this sweater for my daughter for Christmas. The material is very soft and it seems very well made. She will be very excited to open this on Christmas morning! Read more
items.author: Dini

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bold look
items.body: This sweater has a bold look with its large white and green stripes, and the knit material feels really nice—soft and tightly woven, so it’s not see-through at all. The sleeves are longer than the waist, which gives it a slightly oversized feel. It’s definitely a cute piece, but it fits a bit boxy on me, and I’m still figuring out how to style it into a full outfit. I love sweaters in general, but this one might be better suited for casual or laid-back looks. I have a feeling it might shrink after the first wash, so I’ll wait and see how it holds up. Overall, it’s a cozy and fun sweater with a unique vibe. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Blue fine, Green short
items.body: Bought this in a Blue and White and was perfect and soft. This one in the green and white had sleeves that were too short. Same size med. Not sure what happened. Read more
items.author: TNM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty
items.body: Pretty but the packing is air sealed so make sure you take it out so it can take shape. Read more
items.author: Tina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and Comfy
items.body: Beautiful, soft, well made. It is stated as oversized, and for that reason I ordered two sizes smaller than what I normally wear. Overall my experience with (especially) women's sizes on clothing sold by Amazon is disastrous. From one manufacturer to another there is no standard or consistency S, M, L, or XL. This fits me comfortably, so I like it a lot. Recommended. But be careful of the size. I normally wear an XL- and everything I've gotten recently in an extra-large is too small. This one is a large and I love how it fits. As a Vine Reviewer, I receive selected items at no charge in exchange for a fair and honest review. Reviews can only be edited by the author of the review (me). Approval or disapproval and publication of reviews is only granted by Amazon staff, never by the seller or manufacturer. Definitely recommended. As a Vine Reviewer, I receive selected items at no charge in exchange for a fair and honest review. Reviews can only be edited by the author of the review (me). Approval or disapproval and publication of reviews is only granted by Amazon staff, never by the seller or manufacturer. Definitely recommended. Read more
items.author: Naomi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fall sweater
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I love this sweater! It's pretty light so it's nice to wear when the weather is cooler but not all the way cold. It is a pretty chunky knit so there are lots of gaps for air to come through. It's an oversized fit so you don't really need to size up if you want a larger size. The sleeves seemed really long so I've started rolling them up to make sure they don't swallow my hands. Read more
items.author: Court K.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, oversized sweater for fall.
items.body: This is a cute sweater to wear for the fall. The material is light to medium weight which is perfect for me since I live in Florida and it never gets brutally cold here. This is the perfect sweater to throw over a tee shirt on a chilly morning to walk my dogs. I love the oversized fit and it looks really cute with jeans or leggings. The sleeves are rather on the wide side and like others have stated, it’s difficult to fold them up since they don’t stay put but for me this isn’t a deal breaker. I ordered the green/green color and the mix of mint green/ Kelly green stripes are even nicer in person. Read more
items.author: BklynGal76

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Stripes-green, Stripes-blue and White, Stripes-red and Pink, Stripes-pink and Yellow, Stripes-light Pink, Stripes-green and White, Stripes-blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
